basics.name: Material Logistics Specialist
basics.summary: Vacancy Identification Number (VIN: 1192501) Claims Assistant (Intake Specialist), GS05/07. Over 10 years of Administration and Logistics Specialist experience. Comprehensive knowledge and hands-on experience in all aspects of supply: shipping/receiving customer service and safety management.

work.name: American Airlines
work.summary: Responsible for receiving, requisitioning, shipping, warehousing, storing, dispersing and recording parts, equipment and supplies. Specialized in organizing supplies, records, and accountability/inventory forms. Created and presented administrative documents using Microsoft Power point, Excel and Word. Experience in inventory, records keeping, and machinery equipment operations.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Responsible for all aspects of airport catering functions, assisting in the selection and professional development of new management and non-management employees.

work.name: FEDEX Ground
work.summary: Responsible for the courteous and efficient pick-up and delivery of customer mail and packages. Developed proper use of the hand-held scanning/package tracking devices.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Coordinated daily administrative activities and directly supervised 10 to 15 clerical personnel. Trained employees on software programs: Word Perfect, Microsoft Word, Excel, Power Point and Sabre System.

awards.title: Veterans Preference Awards (Expeditionary Medal, National Defense Service Medal, Navy Achievement Medals.)
